sense.gloss: methodical, precise, meticulous, scrupulous, regular, punctual
wooden post that has been carved to have a rounded corner with grooves running along either side of it

sdata.j: お↑金↑↓かね↓の↑事↑↓こと↓では↑彼女↑↓かのじょ↓は|↑几帳面|↑↓きちょうめん↓です。
sdata.e: She is exact in money matters.

sdata.j: ↑彼↑↓かれ↓は|↑几帳面|↑↓きちょうめん↓な↑男↑↓おとこ↓だな。
↑私↑↓わたし↓は|↑几帳面|↑↓きちょうめん↓なんだ。
トムの↑仕事↑↓しごと↓の↑仕方↑↓しかた↓はとても|↑几帳面|↑↓きちょうめん↓だ。
sdata.e: Tom is very methodical in the way he does his work.
